chatGptLabel: Web Stories Content Generator from Article
promptPrefix:
Can you help with my article to help me generate content for web stories in WordPress in [TARGETLANGUAGE], summarise it and make it in 10 points. it should be in such a way that any human being after reading these 10 points get a clear context of story. try to make these points shorter, under 100 characters is recommended.
I want you to write like a 10-year-old kid tone, the content should have 0% plagiarism and passes the AI Content detector tool. Also, Optimize the web story content for SEO

You can find more about my article here: [PROMPT]

Also at the end give me Web Story SEO Optimized Title and Meta Description text at the end which are 0% Plagarism
title: Web Stories Content Generator from Article
